info.title: PACE Payment API
info.description:
Welcome to the PACE Payment API documentation.
This API is responsible for managing payment methods for users as well as authorizing payments on behalf of PACE services.

Errors.description: Error objects provide additional information about problems encountered while performing an operation.

id.description: A unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem.

about.description: A link that leads to further details about this particular occurrence of the problem.

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem, expressed as a string value.

code.description: an application-specific error code, expressed as a string value.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem that SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. Like title, this fieldâ€™s value can be localized.

source.desciption: An object containing references to the source of the error.

pointer.description: A JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document [e.g. "/data" for a primary data object, or "/data/attributes/title" for a specific attribute].

parameter.description: A string indicating which URI query parameter caused the error.

meta.description: a meta object containing non-standard meta-information about the error.
